zh.title: 比特币/美元技术分析：[震荡整理，需关注关键支撑位]
zh.content:
当前比特币/美元(BTC/USD)价格在90728.21附近，整体呈现震荡整理的趋势。价格未能有效突破91000的心理关口，显示出市场多空分歧较大。短期内，交易者需密切关注这一区间内的价格波动，以便把握可能的交易机会。

从技术指标来看，虽然RSI(14)数据缺失，但MACD的值为143.88115，表明短期内市场动能偏强。然而，由于信号线数据缺失，难以进一步确认上涨趋势的持续性。SMA(20)为91089.43，该均线作为短期阻力位，若价格突破此点位，有望引发更多买盘。

支撑位方面，当前主要支撑位在90521.46，若价格跌破该水平，可能引发更大的抛售压力。因此，交易者应保持谨慎，关注市场动态，及时调整策略。在此背景下，建议短线交易者可以考虑在接近支撑位时寻求买入机会，而在接近阻力位时则考虑适度获利了结。

en.title: Bitcoin vs US Dollar Technical Analysis
en.content:
The current price of Bitcoin against the US Dollar is positioned at 90,728.21, reflecting a slight upward movement of 0.11% over the past 24 hours. This minor change suggests that market participants are exhibiting cautious optimism. However, the price remains below the 20-day Simple Moving Average (SMA) of 91,089.43, indicating a potential bearish trend in the short term. A sustained move above the SMA could signal a shift toward bullish sentiment, encouraging traders to look for long positions.

Examining the high and low within the last 24 hours, the price has oscillated between 90,819.28 and 90,521.46. This range establishes immediate support at 90,521.46, with resistance encountered near the recent high of 90,819.28. A break below the support level may prompt further declines, potentially targeting the next support zone. Conversely, if the price breaches resistance, it could pave the way for a rally towards higher levels, thereby attracting more buyers.

The MACD, currently at 143.88115, indicates that there is momentum in the market, though the absence of a signal line makes it difficult to draw definitive conclusions. Traders should monitor this indicator closely for any potential crossover that could signal a change in momentum. Additionally, the Relative Strength Index (RSI) remains unavailable; thus, assessing whether the market is overbought or oversold is challenging. This lack of data necessitates caution for traders considering entry or exit points.

Given the current market context, it is advisable for traders to adopt a wait-and-see approach. A confirmation of a breakout above resistance or a breakdown below support will provide clearer signals for positioning. Traders should also keep an eye on broader market trends and news developments that may influence Bitcoin's price, as the cryptocurrency market can be particularly reactive to external factors. Overall, a disciplined approach will be essential in navigating the current market dynamics.
